Lokeren.title: Lokeren
Lokeren.byline: Lokeren is a city of 43,000 residents (2020) in East Flanders.

Loket.title: Loket
Loket.byline: Loket is a town in Bohemia in Western Czech Republic with a population of 3,000 in 2022.

Loktak Lake.title: Loktak Lake
Loktak Lake.byline: Loktak Lake (Meitei: ꯂꯣꯛꯇꯥꯛ ꯄꯥꯠ, Loktak Paat) is a freshwater lake in South Asia.

Lokoja.title: Lokoja
Lokoja.byline: Lokoja is the capital city of Kogi State, a state in North Central part of Nigeria.
